welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Billerica, where charm and history combine to create an unforgettable experience. Known for its rich colonial heritage and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private flights, there is a separate terminal with exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport houses all passenger services and amenities.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is used for regional flights and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
